trans-unit.source: Represents a class that provides data for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragDrop*>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnDragEnter*>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver*> events in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe que fornece dados para o <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver*>eventos no designer de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver*>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] These event arguments are passed to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes when a drag-and-drop operation is in progress on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Esses argumentos de evento são passados para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>classes quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar está em andamento na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes can access the information contained in the ActivityDragEventArgs class to influence the behavior of the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>classes podem acessar as informações contidas na classe ActivityDragEventArgs para influenciar o comportamento da operação.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of activities upon which a drag-and-drop operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de atividades no qual uma operação de arrastar e soltar é executada.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> objects on which the drag-and-drop operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura que contém todos os <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> objetos em que a operação de arrastar e soltar é executada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location where the activities are to be dropped on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local em que as atividades devem ser descartados na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> class creates a drag image for the activities being dragged.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>classe cria uma imagem de arrastar para as atividades que está sendo arrastado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> objects can use the DragImageSnapPoint property to snap the image to a target and drop the activities at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>objetos podem usar a propriedade DragImageSnapPoint para ajustar a imagem para um destino e remover as atividades no local especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the location on the workflow design surface where the activities will be dropped.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que define o local na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho em que as atividades serão removidas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> on the workflow design surface where a drag operation began.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho em que uma operação de arrastar começou.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the location on the workflow design surface where the drag operation began.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que define o local na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho em que a operação de arrastar começou.
